wikipedia_page.main: David Scott is an English cricketer. He made his first-class debut on 28 March 2017 for Oxford MCCU against Surrey as part of the Marylebone Cricket Club University fixtures.

response: David Scott (born 1932) is a former American astronaut.

* David Scott (painter) (1806–1849), Scottish painter
* David Scott (art historian) (1916–2009), American artist and art historian
